title: Chris Paul goes perfect and NFL Draft
description:
Chris Paul is perfect or at least he was last night from the field. Jalen & Jacoby discuss the epic performance by the Suns’ point guard to close out the series vs the Pelicans. Find out what the guys think of their chances moving forward. And Luka propels the Mavericks out of the first round. Find out how Kidd’s coaching helped put Luka in the best spot to win. Plus, no blown 3-1 lead for the 76ers. Are things all good with Philly or will they struggle against the number 1 seed Miami Heat? Also, it’s NFL Draft round 1. Lions making moves but find out how the AJ Brown and Hollywood Brown trades shake up the league. All this and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
itunes:subtitle: J&J: Chris Paul Puts On A Masterclass, NFL Draft Round 1 Reaction
